Host Mayo is affordable [SSD Web Hosting](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php) provider since 2015. 

* All our web hosting plans come loaded with following features:
*  Multi PHP
*  Cloudflare
*  Softaculous
*  Servers in USA
*  Pure SSD storage
*  Whitelabel Hosting
*  Node JS, Ruby, Perl
*  99% Uptime Guarantee
*  Private Name Servers
*  Free cPanel Migration
*  24/7 Technical Support
*  Softaculous Auto Installer
*  Latest cPanel with CloudLinux

**Discount Offer!!**
Enjoy 80% Recurring discount using Promotional Code: **tron** (Use the coupon on checkout page.)
All prices are mentioned below using 80% off coupon.

_Starter Plan - $2.4/Year OR 0.3$/Month_

*  1 GB Disk Space
*  1 Domain
*  10 Sub Domains
*  10 Email Accounts
*  10 MySQL Databases
*  10 FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](https://hostmayo.com/members/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=4)

_Economy Plan - $6/Year OR 0.6$Month_

*  5 GB Disk Space
*  5 Domains
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order Now](http://hostmayo.com/members/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=4)

_Professional Plan - $8/Year OR 0.8$/Month_

*  15 Disk Space
*  Unlimited Domains
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://hostmayo.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](http://www.hostmayo.com/members/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=9)


**Payment Modes**

We accept PayPal, Credit Card, Perfect Money, Bitcoins, Check / Money Order.

**Order business hosting for more resources. 80% recurring discount also applicable on [Business Hosting plans](https://hostmayo.com/business-hosting.php) & [Reseller Hosting plans](https://hostmayo.com/reseller-hosting.php) **
